biocontainers.name: lsd
biocontainers.summary: The LAPPS Grid Services DSL (LSD). Used to invoke LAPPS web services from the command line.

biotools.summary: This database contains senescence associated genes (SAGs) from 21 species retrieved based on genetic, genomic, proteomic, physiological or other experimental evidence, and classified into different categories according to their functions in leaf senescence or morphological phenotypes. Users can browse or search the database to obtain information including literatures, mutants, phenotypes, expression profiles, miRNA interactions, orthologs in other plants and cross links to other databases.
